thread.section_title: De Vigny Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Pleasant Stay
thread.title_full: Pleasant Stay - Review of De Vigny Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Merlin123x
title: Pleasant Stay
text:
Had a lovely 2 night stay at the De Vigny , The staff were all super polite and really helpful. Even though the hotel is 5* its not the same standard as a UK 5* in comparison its more of a shabby chic old vintage style boutique hotel, rooms are nice with comfy beds, very clean , however no kettle or tea making facilities .. decor is a bit dated but still a very comfortable stay :) Best bit is the location its very central and 5 mins walk to Champs Elysee's with a 30 min walk to the Eiffel Tower.
Overall a good experience , would definitely go back.
